prompt: Design a Follow/Followers List page with a horizontal tab layout for a unique navigation experience. The page should have a clean white background. The top app bar should be white with a black back arrow icon, a centered 'Followers' title in bold black text, and a black search icon. Below the app bar, place a horizontal scrollable tab bar with 'Following' and 'Followers' as large buttons, where 'Followers' is selected (indigo background, white text) and 'Following' is unselected (white background, indigo text). The scrollable list of user profiles should have a circular profile picture (56px diameter, subtle shadow) on the left, the user's display name in bold black text, and username in smaller gray text. The 'Follow' button on the right should have an indigo background, white text, and rounded corners. Use 16px padding and faint gray divider lines. The layout should use a Column structure with smooth scrolling for tabs.
